Table of Contents

Class TestRunHeadlessGameHost

Namespace
osu.Framework.Testing
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A GameHost which writes to the system temporary directory, attempting to clean up after the test run completes. Also runs in non-realtime (allowing faster test execution) by default.

public class TestRunHeadlessGameHost : HeadlessGameHost, IIpcHost, IDisposable
